data.question: What is the main challenge that NKMOF-1-M materials aim to address?
data.answer: NKMOF-1-M materials aim to address the challenge of highly selective separation and/or purification of acetylene from various gas mixtures.

data.question: What gases do NKMOF-1-M materials exhibit selectivity towards acetylene over?
data.answer: NKMOF-1-M materials exhibit selectivity towards acetylene over CO2 and CH4.

data.question: What is the significance of acetylene in industrial applications?
data.answer: Acetylene is significant in industrial applications for the production of plastics, acrylic derivatives, vinyl compounds, and a-ethynyl alcohols.

data.question: Why is the separation of acetylene from CH4 and CO2 industrially relevant?
data.answer: The separation of acetylene from CH4 and CO2 is industrially relevant because the production of C2H2 usually generates these gases, requiring efficient and energy-efficient purification methods.

data.question: What makes MOFs potentially superior to traditional porous materials for gas separation?
data.answer: MOFs are potentially superior due to their crystallinity, ultra-high surface area, tuneable pore size, and the ability to design features that enhance C2H2 capture.

data.question: What are the key features of NKMOF-1-M that contribute to its high C2H2 binding affinity?
data.answer: The key features include ultramicropores, open metal sites, and a 3D framework with 1D square channels.

data.question: True or False: NKMOF-1-M materials rely on the same mechanism as current benchmark physisorbents for their performance.
data.answer: False

data.question: True or False: NKMOF-1-M materials are stable in water for at least six months at room temperature.
data.answer: True

data.question: What is the BET surface area of NKMOF-1-Ni after activation?
data.answer: NKMOF-1-Ni has a BET surface area of 382 m2 g@1 after activation.

data.question: True or False: NKMOF-1-Ni has a higher BET surface area than NKMOF-1-Cu.
data.answer: True

data.question: What is the adsorption selectivity of NKMOF-1-Ni for C2H2/CO2 (1/1, v/v) at 298 K?
data.answer: The adsorption selectivity of NKMOF-1-Ni for C2H2/CO2 (1/1, v/v) at 298 K is 249.3.

data.question: True or False: The selectivity of NKMOF-1-Ni towards C2H2/CH4 (1/1, v/v) is less than that of ZJU-198 a.
data.answer: False

data.question: What experimental technique was used to study the crystal structure of NKMOF-1-Cu under C2H2?
data.answer: Single-crystal X-ray diffraction (SCXRD) was used to study the crystal structure of NKMOF-1-Cu under C2H2.

data.question: True or False: NKMOF-1-Ni can be recycled at least five times without loss of performance.
data.answer: True

data.question: What is the breakthrough time for C2H2 in a C2H2/CH4 (1/1, v/v) mixture at 298 K using NKMOF-1-Ni?
data.answer: The breakthrough time for C2H2 in a C2H2/CH4 (1/1, v/v) mixture at 298 K using NKMOF-1-Ni is 38.3 minutes.

data.question: True or False: The performance of NKMOF-1-M materials in gas separation is attributed solely to their large specific surface areas.
data.answer: False

data.question: What theoretical methods were used to understand the acetylene adsorption performance of NKMOF-1-M?
data.answer: GCMC (grand canonical Monte Carlo) methods and first-principles DFT-D (dispersion-corrected density functional theory) calculations were used.

data.question: True or False: NKMOF-1-Ni exhibits the highest selectivities yet reported for C2H2/CO2 and C2H2/CH4.
data.answer: True

data.question: What is the role of open metal sites in NKMOF-1-M materials?
data.answer: Open metal sites in NKMOF-1-M materials contribute to strong interactions between C2H2 and pore walls, enhancing C2H2 capture.

data.question: True or False: The adsorption selectivity of NKMOF-1-Ni for C2H2 over C2H4 is lower than that of SIFSIX-14-Cu-i.
data.answer: True
